verses.verse: בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah פֶּ֧רֶץ <WH6557> Pe-retz Pharez חֶצְר֛וֹן <WH2696> chetz-Ron Hezron וְכַרְמִ֖י <WH3756> ve-char-Mi and Carmi וְח֥וּר <WH2354> ve-Chur and Hur וְשׁוֹבָֽל׃ <WH7732> ve-sho-Val. and Shobal

וּרְאָיָ֤ה <WH7211> u-re-'a-Yah And Reaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son שׁוֹבָל֙ <WH7732> sho-Val of Shobal הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יַ֔חַת <WH3189> Ya-chat, Jahath וְיַ֣חַת <WH3189> ve-Ya-chat and Jahath הֹלִ֔יד <WH3205> ho-Lid, begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲחוּמַ֖י <WH267> 'a-chu-Mai Ahumai וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et לָ֑הַד <WH3855> La-had; and Lahad אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families הַצָּֽרְעָתִֽי׃ <WH6882> hatz-Tza-re-'a-Ti. of the Zorathites ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ve-'El-leh These אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi And these [were of] the father עֵיטָ֔ם <WH5862> 'ei-Tam, of Etam יִזְרְעֶ֥אל <WH3157> yiz-re-'El Jezreel וְיִשְׁמָ֖א <WH3457> ve-yish-Ma and Ishma וְיִדְבָּ֑שׁ <WH3031> ve-yid-Bash; and Idbash וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> ve-Shem and the name אֲחוֹתָ֖ם <WH269> a-cho-Tam of their sister הַצְלֶלְפּֽוֹנִי׃ <WH6753> hatz-lel-Po-ni. [was] Hazelelponi

וּפְנוּאֵל֙ <WH6439> u-fe-nu-'El And Penuel אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father גְדֹ֔ר <WH1446> ge-Dor, of Gedor וְעֵ֖זֶר <WH5829> ve-'E-zer and Ezer אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father חוּשָׁ֑ה <WH2364> chu-Shah; of Hushah אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- These [are] the sons חוּר֙ <WH2354> chur of Hur בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor the firstborn אֶפְרָ֔תָה <WH672> 'ef-Ra-tah, of Ephratah אֲבִ֖י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father בֵּ֥ית beit לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> La-chem. of Bethlehem

וּלְאַשְׁחוּר֙ <WH806> u-le-'ash-Chur And Ashur אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father תְק֔וֹעַ <WH8620> te-Ko-a', of Tekoa הָי֖וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu had שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei had two נָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> na-Shim; wives חֶלְאָ֖ה <WH2458> chel-'Ah Helah וְנַעֲרָֽה׃ <WH5292> ve-na-'a-Rah. and Naarah

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led bare ל֤וֹ lo נַעֲרָה֙ <WH5292> na-'a-Rah And Naarah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲחֻזָּ֣ם <WH275> 'a-chuz-Zam him Ahuzam וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֵ֔פֶר <WH2660> Che-fer, and Hepher וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et תֵּימְנִ֖י <WH8488> teim-Ni and Temeni וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאֲחַשְׁתָּרִ֑י <WH326> ha-'a-chash-ta-Ri; and Haahashtari אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei These [were] the sons נַעֲרָֽה׃ <WH5292> na-'a-Rah. of Naarah

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons חֶלְאָ֑ה <WH2458> chel-'Ah; of Helah צֶ֥רֶת <WH6889> Tze-ret [were] Zereth; יִצְחָר yitz-char כוְצֹ֖חַר <WH3328> ve-Tzo-char Jitschar קוְאֶתְנָֽן׃ <WH869> ve-'et-Nan. and Ethnan

וְק֣וֹץ <WH6976> ve-Kotz And Coz הוֹלִ֔יד <WH3205> ho-Lid, begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עָנ֖וּב <WH6036> 'a-Nuv Anub וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַצֹּבֵבָ֑ה <WH6637> hatz-tzoe-Vah; and Zobebah וּמִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> u-mish-pe-Chot and the families אֲחַרְחֵ֖ל <WH316> 'a-char-Chel of Aharhel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הָרֽוּם׃ <WH2037> ha-Rum. of Harum

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi become יַעְבֵּ֔ץ <WH3258> ya'-Betz, And Jabez נִכְבָּ֖ד <WH3513> nich-Bad was more honourable מֵאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> me-'e-Chav; than his brethren וְאִמּ֗וֹ <WH517> ve-'im-Mo, and his mother קָרְאָ֨ה <WH7121> ka-re-'Ah called שְׁמ֤וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name יַעְבֵּץ֙ <WH3258> ya'-Betz Jabez לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki Because יָלַ֖דְתִּי <WH3205> ya-Lad-ti Because I bare בְּעֹֽצֶב׃ <WH6090> be-'O-tzev. him with sorrow

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called יַ֠עְבֵּץ <WH3258> Ya'-betz And Jabez לֵאלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> le-lo-Hei on the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying אִם־ <WH518> 'im- Oh that בָּרֵ֨ךְ <WH1288> ba-Rech thou wouldest bless תְּבָרֲכֵ֜נִי <WH1288> te-va-ra-Che-ni me indeed וְהִרְבִּ֤יתָ <WH7235> ve-hir-Bi-ta and enlarge אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גְּבוּלִי֙ <WH1366> ge-vu-Li my coast וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah become יָדְךָ֙ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha and that thine hand עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> 'im-Mi, would וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta might be with me and that thou wouldest keep מֵּרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> me-ra-'Ah [me] from evil לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti that may not עָצְבִּ֑י <WH6087> 'a-tze-Bi; that it may not grieve וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve granted אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him me And God אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what שָׁאָֽל׃ <WH7592> sha-'Al. him that which he requested

וּכְל֥וּב <WH3620> u-che-Luv And Chelub אֲחִֽי־ <WH251> 'a-chi- the brother שׁוּחָ֖ה <WH7746> shu-Chah of Shuah הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מְחִ֑יר <WH4243> me-Chir; Mehir ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu who אֲבִ֥י <WH1> 'a-Vi which [was] the father אֶשְׁתּֽוֹן׃ <WH850> esh-Ton. of Eshton

וְאֶשְׁתּ֗וֹן <WH850> ve-'esh-Ton, And Eshton הוֹלִ֞יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֤ית beit רָפָא֙ <WH1051> ra-Fa Bethrapha וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פָּסֵ֔חַ <WH6454> pa-Se-ach, and Paseah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et תְּחִנָּ֖ה <WH8468> te-chin-Nah and Tehinnah אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father עִ֣יר 'ir נָחָ֑שׁ <WH5904> na-Chash; of Irnahash אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei are the men רֵכָֽה׃ <WH7397> re-Chah. of Rechah ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons קְנַ֔ז <WH7073> ke-Naz, of Kenaz עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <WH6274> 'a-te-ni-'El Othniel וּשְׂרָיָ֑ה <WH8304> u-se-ra-Yah; and Seraiah וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the sons עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <WH6274> 'a-te-ni-'El of Othniel חֲתַֽת׃ <WH2867> cha-Tat. Hathath

וּמְעוֹנֹתַ֖י <WH4587> u-me-'o-no-Tai And Meonothai הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עָפְרָ֑ה <WH6084> 'a-fe-Rah; Ophrah וּשְׂרָיָ֗ה <WH8304> u-se-ra-Yah, and Seraiah הוֹלִ֤יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> yo-'Av Joab אֲבִי֙ <WH1> 'a-Vi the father גֵּ֣יא <WH1516> gei of the valley חֲרָשִׁ֔ים <WH2798> cha-ra-Shim, of Charashim כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for חֲרָשִׁ֖ים <WH2796> cha-ra-Shim were craftsmen הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> ha-Yu. become פ Peh

וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons כָּלֵ֣ב <WH3612> ka-Lev of Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֔ה <WH3312> ye-fun-Neh, of Jephunneh עִ֥ירוּ <WH5900> 'I-ru Iru אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> 'e-Lah Elah וָנָ֑עַם <WH5277> va-Na-'am; and Naam וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the sons אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> 'e-Lah of Elah וּקְנַֽז׃ <WH7073> u-ke-Naz. even Kenaz

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons יְהַלֶּלְאֵ֑ל <WH3094> ye-hal-lel-'El; of Jehaleleel זִ֣יף <WH2128> zif Ziph וְזִיפָ֔ה <WH2129> ve-zi-Fah, and Ziphah תִּירְיָ֖א <WH8493> tir-Ya Tiria וַאֲשַׂרְאֵֽל׃ <WH840> va-'a-sar-'El. and Asareel

וּבֶן־ <WH1121> u-ven- And the sons עֶזְרָ֔ה <WH5834> 'ez-Rah, of Ezra יֶ֥תֶר <WH3500> Ye-ter [were] Jether וּמֶ֖רֶד <WH4778> u-Me-red and Mered וְעֵ֣פֶר <WH6081> ve-'E-fer and Epher וְיָל֑וֹן <WH3210> ve-ya-Lon; and Jalon וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <WH2029> vat-Ta-har and she bare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִרְיָ֣ם <WH4813> mir-Yam Miriam וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שַׁמַּ֔י <WH8060> sham-Mai, and Shammai וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יִשְׁבָּ֖ח <WH3431> yish-Bach and Ishbah אֲבִ֥י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father אֶשְׁתְּמֹֽעַ׃ <WH851> 'esh-te-Mo-a'. of Eshtemoa

וְאִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <WH802> ve-'ish-To And his wife הַיְהֻדִיָּ֗ה <WH3057> hay-hu-di-Yah, Jehudijah יָלְדָ֞ה <WH3205> Yal-dah bare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יֶ֨רֶד <WH3382> Ye-red Jered אֲבִ֤י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father גְדוֹר֙ <WH1446> ge-dOr of Gedor וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH2268> che-ver and Heber אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father שׂוֹכ֔וֹ <WH7755> so-Cho, of Socho וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יְקֽוּתִיאֵ֖ל <WH3354> ye-ku-ti-'El and Jekuthiel אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father זָנ֑וֹחַ <WH2182> za-No-ach; of Zanoah וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh, another בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> be-Nei And these [are] the sons בִּתְיָ֣ה <WH1332> bit-Yah of Bithiah בַת־ <WH1323> vat- the daughter פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, of Pharaoh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after לָקַ֖ח <WH3947> la-Kach took מָֽרֶד׃ <WH4778> Ma-red. which Mered ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet of [his] wife הֽוֹדִיָּ֔ה <WH1940> ho-di-Yah, Hodiah אֲח֣וֹת <WH269> a-Chot the sister נַ֔חַם <WH5163> Na-cham, of Naham אֲבִ֥י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father קְעִילָ֖ה <WH7084> ke-'i-Lah of Keilah הַגַּרְמִ֑י <WH1636> hag-gar-Mi; the Garmite וְאֶשְׁתְּמֹ֖עַ <WH851> ve-'esh-te-Mo-a' and Eshtemoa הַמַּעֲכָתִֽי׃ <WH4602> ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti. the Maachathite

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons שִׁימ֔וֹן <WH7889> shi-Mon, of Shimon אַמְנ֣וֹן <WH550> am-Non [were] Amnon וְרִנָּ֔ה <WH7441> ve-rin-Nah, and Rinnah בֶּן־ ben- חָנָ֖ן <WH1135> cha-Nan Benhanan; וְתֹולֹון ve-to-lon כוְתִילֹ֑ון <WH8436> ve-ti-Lon; birth קוּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons יִשְׁעִ֔י <WH3469> yish-'I, of Ishi זוֹחֵ֖ת <WH2105> zo-Chet [were] Zoheth וּבֶן־ u-ven- זוֹחֵֽת׃ <WH1132> zo-Chet. and Benzoheth

בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> be-Nei The sons שֵׁלָ֣ה <WH7956> she-Lah of Shelah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah עֵ֚ר <WH6147> 'er [were] Er אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father לֵכָ֔ה <WH3922> le-Chah, of Lecah וְלַעְדָּ֖ה <WH3935> ve-la'-Dah and Laadah אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father מָרֵשָׁ֑ה <WH4762> ma-re-Shah; of Mareshah וּמִשְׁפְּח֛וֹת <WH4940> u-mish-pe-Chot and the families בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> 'a-vo-Dat of them that wrought הַבֻּ֖ץ <WH948> hab-Butz fine linen לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit of the house אַשְׁבֵּֽעַ׃ <WH791> 'ash-Be-a'. of Ashbea

וְיוֹקִ֞ים <WH3137> ve-yo-Kim And Jokim וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> ve-'an-Shei and the men כֹזֵבָ֗א <WH3578> cho-ze-Va, of Chozeba וְיוֹאָ֧שׁ <WH3101> ve-yo-'Ash and Joash וְשָׂרָ֛ף <WH8315> ve-sa-Raf and Saraph אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בָּעֲל֥וּ <WH1166> ba-'a-Lu who had the dominion לְמוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> le-mo-'Av in Moab וְיָשֻׁ֣בִי ve-ya-Shu-vi לָ֑חֶם <WH3433> La-chem; and Jashubilehem וְהַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> ve-had-de-va-Rim things עַתִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6267> 'at-ti-Kim. And [these are] ancient

הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah These הַיּ֣וֹצְרִ֔ים <WH3335> hai-Yotz-Rim, These [were] the potters וְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei and those that dwelt נְטָעִ֖ים <WH5196> ne-ta-'Im among plants וּגְדֵרָ֑ה <WH1449> u-ge-de-Rah; Gederah עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech with the king בִּמְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <WH4399> bim-lach-To for his work יָ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> Ya-she-vu there they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. there ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on; of Simeon נְמוּאֵ֣ל <WH5241> ne-mu-'El [were] Nemuel וְיָמִ֔ין <WH3226> ve-ya-Min, and Jamin יָרִ֖יב <WH3402> ya-Riv Jarib זֶ֥רַח <WH2226> Ze-rach Zerah שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> sha-'Ul. [and] Shaul
שַׁלֻּ֥ם <WH7967> shal-Lum Shallum בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son מִבְשָׂ֥ם <WH4017> miv-Sam Mibsam בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son מִשְׁמָ֥ע <WH4927> mish-Ma' Mishma בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son
